Reviews.Title: “Basic hotel with definitely no frills at all!”

Reviews.Content: little money spend accommodation hotel chain advantage hotel location easy access singapore plenty eat outside walking distance classed red light district mosque minutes walk hotel slightly noisy night expected nightclubs road safe reception constantly manned free wifi offer deceiving connected kick couple minutes sign frustrating request password day frustrating hotel basic frills attached chance stay malaysia border bahru pay budget hotel accommodation singapore price hotel deal malaysia ie breakfast larger view

Reviews.Title: “BROTHEL!!!”

Reviews.Content: overnight 6 hours total stay singapore opted cheap clean close airport little getting ourselves check hear loud argument lady half naked runs lobby arguing payment check staff barely commotion indicating sort event normal trying avoid eye contact lady looked wall rented hour expedia website booked hours exhausted travelling upstairs stunk cigarettes called reception told nonsmoking yeah available ground floor arguing couple avoid costs

Reviews.Title: “Hotel 81 chain - all the same, most basic of the basic, avoid..”
Reviews.Author: ck999
Reviews.Content: stayed 1 night hotel 81 overnight stop singapore partner booked judgement previously negative experience hotel 81 hotel hollywood listened head touted hotels chain decor experience barely fit luggage shower situated didnt close bathroom door water straight bedroom walls thin kept awake hours noise coming adjacent finally complained noise slowly abated 81 chain designed travelers isnt lot love location outlook management disinterested taking owners budget traveler considering singapore hostels offer facilities money
